short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A little extension to make your homepage look a little nicer :D.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LAHP - La (that's me!) HomePage is a nice little extension that modifies your homepage to show the time, date, and weather for those living in Toronto.
